column1: A Celebration of Life Service will be held Tuesday afternoon at 3:00 p.m.in the Crossing Church at 48th and Maine in Quincy
column2: with Pastor Chris Schaefer officiating  Visitation will be at Tuesday afternoon at The Crossing from 2:00 p.m. until the time of service.   Inurnment will take place  at St. John's Lutheran Church Cemetery in Decatur at a later Date.
